short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate selected or copied text using the Yoru Stories Translation API - Powered by Generative AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview
Unlock and translate entire pages of text effortlessly with Generative AI by highlighting the desired text, or pasting it into the Paste Window.

This extension adds a button to your extension toolbar that lets you log in using your Yoru Stories account and access AI-assisted translations powered by the Yoru Stories Translation API.

üö® IMPORTANT NOTE:
This extension requires a Yoru Stories account (register at https://app.yoru.world/register) WITH A PASSWORD (if already signed up using Google/Apple/Facebook, please set a password as well at https://app.yoru.world/en/settings/account) AND an AI Translation Subscription (https://app.yoru.world/subscribe). Unlimited usage for only $3 USD/month, or $30 USD/year. A 1-week free trial is available.

üîì Enable Text Selection and Copying On Any Page:
Say goodbye to the mangled machine translations of old. Unlock a whole new world of streamlined translations; read like a native directly on websites. Simply right-click on your selected text or paste it into the Paste Window, harness the power of modern AI, and enjoy high quality automated translations, easy as 1, 2, 3!
